farmcity.dao

Class FriendDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • farmcity.dao.FriendDAO

  • public class FriendDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods to retrieve and modify data from the FriendData CSV File

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFriend(Player player, java.lang.String friendUsername)
      This method adds a new friend to the HashMaps of friends of the current Player
      void addRequest(Player player, java.lang.String friendUsername)
      This method adds a new Friend request to the ArrayList of Friends of the current Player and save player's current progress
      void delete(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String friendUsername)
      This method removes a friend from the ArrayList of Friends of the current Player and save player's current progress
      static void destroyInstance()
      This method set the current Player Data Access Object to null
      static FriendDAO getInstance()
      This method initializes the Inventory Data Access Object
      void load()
      This method loads all pair of Friends and Requests into a HashMap
      java.util.HashMap<Player,java.lang.Character> retrieveAllFriends(java.lang.String username)
      This method return a HashMap of Friends of the Player who has the specified username
      java.util.HashMap<Player,java.lang.Character> retrieveAllRequestsFriends(java.lang.String username)
      This method return a HashMap of Friends and Requests of the Player who has the specified username.
      void save()
      This method allows player to save his/ her Players' current Friends and Requests progress to the database file.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getInstance

        public static FriendDAO getInstance()
                             throws CityException
        This method initializes the Inventory Data Access Object
        Returns:
        Data Access Object for Inventory
        Throws:
        CityException - if the file(s) cannot be found at the specified directory

      • destroyInstance

        public static void destroyInstance()
        This method set the current Player Data Access Object to null

      • load

        public void load()
          throws CityException
        This method loads all pair of Friends and Requests into a HashMap
        Throws:
        CityException - if the file(s) cannot be found at the specified directory

      • retrieveAllRequestsFriends

        public java.util.HashMap<Player,java.lang.Character> retrieveAllRequestsFriends(java.lang.String username)
        This method return a HashMap of Friends and Requests of the Player who has the specified username. The character represents the status of the relationship (r for request and f for friend)
        Parameters:
        username - username of the player whose friend list is to be returned
        Returns:
        the HashMap of the player's friend list

      • retrieveAllFriends

        public java.util.HashMap<Player,java.lang.Character> retrieveAllFriends(java.lang.String username)
        This method return a HashMap of Friends of the Player who has the specified username
        Parameters:
        username - username of the player whose friend list is to be returned
        Returns:
        the HashMap of the player's friend list

      • addFriend

        public void addFriend(Player player,
                      java.lang.String friendUsername)
               throws CityException
        This method adds a new friend to the HashMaps of friends of the current Player
        Parameters:
        player - Player object of the current player
        friendUsername - Username of the Friend to be added
        Throws:
        CityException - if the file(s) cannot be found at the specified directory

      • addRequest

        public void addRequest(Player player,
                       java.lang.String friendUsername)
                throws CityException
        This method adds a new Friend request to the ArrayList of Friends of the current Player and save player's current progress
        Parameters:
        player - Player of the current player
        friendUsername - Username of the player whose request to be added
        Throws:
        CityException - if the file(s) cannot be found at the specified directory

      • delete

        public void delete(java.lang.String username,
                   java.lang.String friendUsername)
            throws CityException
        This method removes a friend from the ArrayList of Friends of the current Player and save player's current progress
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the current player
        friendUsername - Username of the Friend to be removed
        Throws:
        CityException - if the file(s) cannot be found at the specified directory

      • save

        public void save()
          throws CityException
        This method allows player to save his/ her Players' current Friends and Requests progress to the database file.
        Throws:
        CityException - if there is something wrong with writing to the file, throws CityException
